article: Hello!I am  _  English boy. My name is Robert Black. So my  _  name is Robert. I'm a middle school student. I'm in Class Two, Grade Seven. Do you want to know about my school  _  ? Let me tell you. I have classes from Monday to Friday. School  _  at eight o' clock. I often  _  the bus to school. We have four classes in the morning. In the afternoon we have two  _  . We have English, math, Chinese,...at school. My favorite  _  is English. I think it's very  _  . After school we don't have much homework, so we have much time to do many interesting things. I am in the  _  club. Every Sunday I go to the club. There I play the piano  _  two hours. ( )
